main event: On April 19, 1948, witnesses observed two elliptical white objects over Greenville AFB, South Carolina, that appeared stationary before rapidly accelerating and climbing.
interesting points: Witnesses initially thought the objects were weather balloons, but upon observing their movement, they became skeptical., The objects were sighted at an estimated altitude of 15,000 to 20,000 feet., The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes., The objects displayed no audible sound and had no exhaust or condensation trails., Witnesses were attracted to the sighting by the sound of fighter aircraft in the vicinity.
witness description: USAF officers from the 5th Liaison Squadron
